content: मुष्टिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [मुष्-क्तिच्] {@--1@} The clenched hand, fist; कर्णांतमेत्य बिमिदे निबिडोपि मुष्टिः <ls>R. 9. 58</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 21</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 59.</ls> {@--2@} A handful, fistful; श्यामाकमुष्टिपरिवर्धितकः <ls>Ś. 4. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 57</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 69</ls>; <ls>Me. 68.</ls> {@--3@} A handle or hilt. {@--4@} A particular measure (= {%pala%}). {@--5@} A measure of capacity equal to one handful. {@--6@} The penis. {@--7@} Stealing (only {%<ab>f.</ab>%}). {@--8@} A compendium, abridgment,
